articles.title: Floral Basket to Statue of Kim Il Sung from Family of Zhang Weihua
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Statue of Kim Il Sung from Family of Zhang Weihua
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The family of Zhang Weihua, anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr in China, sent a floral basket to the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of his demise. 
					 Zhang's son Zhang Jinquan on a visit to the DPRK laid the floral basket before the statue and paid tribute to him Tuesday.

articles.title: Foreign Students Visit Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition
articles.content:
Foreign Students Visit Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Foreign students studying at Kim Il Sung University visited the Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition Tuesday on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					They looked round photos showing exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and his revolutionary life.
					
					They went round his works and books introducing politics, economy, culture, history, etc. of Korea.

articles.title: Undying Feats Performed for Eternal Memory of President Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Undying Feats Performed for Eternal Memory of President Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The servicepersons and people of the DPRK are hardening their will to hold President Kim Il Sung in high esteem for all ages and to firmly defend his revolutionary ideas and undying revolutionary feats and thus add luster to them generation after generation on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of his demise.
					The world witnesses the outstanding greatness of Kim Jong Il, the greatest incarnation of the revolutionary moral obligation, through the realities in the DPRK in which he is holding the leader in high esteem invariably.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Il who set forth many years ago the loyalty to the leader as the highest revolutionary moral obligation of the revolutionaries, the cause of holding the leader in high esteem down through generations has been materialized successfully in the DPRK.
					
					 The Kim Il Sung Constitution on holding in high esteem Kim Il Sung as the eternal President of the DPRK having been adopted and the year of Juche and the Day of the Sun instituted, the Korean people and the world revolutionary people came to consolidate still firmer the faith that the leader will live in their hearts for ever as the sun of Juche.
					
					 The Kumsusan Memorial Palace had been turned into the most sacred place of Juche to preserve the President as in his lifetime.
					
					 Towers inscribed with the slogan of faith "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung will always be with us" set forth by Kim Jong Il were constructed in a good architectural and formative way across the country.
					
					 Beaming images of President Kim Il Sung had been hung with due respect on the facade of the Kumsusan Memorial Palace and in cities, villages and industrial establishments.
					
					 The revolutionary battle sites and the revolutionary sites have been arranged better and monuments to his field guidance and the like erected in different parts of the country so as to convey his exploits to the generations to come.
					
					 Kim Jong Il set forth the revolutionary slogan "Let us arm ourselves firmly with the revolutionary ideas of the great leader Comrade           Kim Il Sung!" and made public various works such as "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung", "Let Us Hold the Great Leader Forever in High Esteem and Accomplish His Cause" and "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might", thus enriching the revolutionary idea of the President and steadily defending its purity.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il the Korean-style socialism permeated with the whole life of the President has been firmly protected and the Party, state and army strengthened and developed into the Party, state and army of the President both in name and reality.

articles.title: Immortal History along with Vehicle to People
articles.content:
Immortal History along with Vehicle to People
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Documentaries on the revolutionary activities and history of President Kim Il Sung are broadcasted by TV and screened in cinemas in the DPRK every day on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of his demise.
					 The films show impressively the great life of the President who had converted the motherland into a country the master of which is the popular masses, always finding himself among the people.
					
					 For the President, it was the revolution, politics, all pleasure and happiness of his life to devote affection to the people.
					
					 He, with his constant view and motto "The people are my God", mixed himself with the people to work out lines and policies, strategies and tactics for the people including the basic line on socialist economic construction, the policy of agricultural cooperation in the postwar days and the "Theses on the Socialist Rural Question in Our Country". 
					
					 He willingly took boiled rice mixed with cereals, saying that when the people eat boiled millet, we should take same food. And he visited a mountainous village in the northern tip, pushing the car on the muddy path, saying that he should go and see wherever the people live.
					
					 He looked round co-op farm fields to indicate the direction and way for good crop till darkness set in. One day he took a green maize ear for belated lunch in a running train and entered a pit to inspire miners. 
					
					 He gave field guidance to various units for the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people for over 8,650 days from October of Juche 34 (1945) to the last moment of his life, covering over 578,000 kilometers.
					
					 The immortal exploits of the President who had established the Korean-style socialist system centered on the people, always finding himself among the people are throwing more radiant ray century after century.
					
					 The venerable image of General Secretary Kim Jong Il visiting windy trenches, factories and co-op farms without letup makes the servicepersons and people recollect the benevolent look and kind smile of the President who had devoted his whole life to field guidance.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Immortal Feats Praised by Mexican Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Immortal Feats Praised by Mexican Party Leader
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Cuautemoc Amezcua Dromundo, first secretary of the Central Committee of the  Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, issued a statement on June 27 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The statement said that the President is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and the progressive people of the world, adding that this would be unthinkable without his great feats and noble traits.
					
					 The President devoted his all to the people till the last moments of his life since he embarked on the road of the revolution in his early years, the statement said, stressing that the feats performed by him for the people would shine forever. 
					
					 The President always shared weal and woe with the people with the noble viewpoint on the people and enjoyed absolute support and trust from the people all his life, noted the statement.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Demise Commemorated in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Demise Commemorated in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A seminar on exploits of President Kim Il Sung was held in Mexico, an opening ceremony of a book and photo exhibition in Guinea and a photo exhibition and a film show in Myanmar on June 27 and 29 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of the President.
					 Put on display in the venues of the events were works of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary
						 Kim Jong Il and books and photos showing their immortal exploits.
					
					 The chairman of the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea said at a seminar that the demise of the President was the greatest loss for the Korean people as well as a big loss for the revolutionary political parties and people of the world struggling for socialism.
					
					 The President was a distinguished political activist, outstanding strategist and prominent leader of the world socialist movement as he led the struggle for socialism against imperialism and the U.S. to victory under the banner of the Juche idea, the Songun idea all his life since he embarked upon the road of revolutionary struggle in his early years, he added.
					
					 The undying feats performed by the President before the Korean revolution and the world revolution will shine forever, he stressed.
					
					 The chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said that the exhibition provided the Guinean people with a meaningful opportunity to deeply grasp the noble feats performed by the President for the human cause of independence and the originality and vitality of the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Vice-President of SPA Presidium Meets Chief of International Body
articles.content:
Vice-President of SPA Presidium Meets Chief of International Body
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Johnny Hon, chairman of the International
					 Kim Il Sung Foundation, and his companion at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.

articles.title: Many Literary Works Dating back to Period of Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle Discovered
articles.content:
Many Literary Works Dating back to Period of Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle Discovered
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- In recent years the Juche Literature Institute of the Academy of Social Sciences of the DPRK has discovered and ascertained at least 50 poems and songs and revolutionary narratives created and disseminated in the vast area along the River Amnok centering around Mt. Paektu and in the northeastern area of China during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle. They deal with the personality of President Kim Il Sung as a great man born of Heaven.
					 Under the harsh colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists the Korean people trusted and followed Kim Il Sung as the man who would save the destiny of the country and the nation and created and disseminated poems, songs and narratives representing their ardent desire.
					
					 Among the works reflecting the absolute trust in Kim Il Sung are "Kim Il Sung Appeared in Korea", "The Sun of the Korean People", "Let's Fight, Reposing Trust in the General Only" and "Azalea".
					
					 "The Hero Appeared in Blue Rivers and Mountains", "The Great Bear Shines" and "Giant Footstep" truthfully depict the feelings of the people praising Kim Il Sung as the greatest general and a peerless patriot produced by the nation.
					
					 The works lauded Kim Il Sung as the greatest man who advanced the military idea and war methods of Juche and established the tradition of single-minded unity.
					
					 Also among them are works dealing with Kim Il Sung's paternal love for the guerrillas and people, the might of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and the people's sincere assistance to the guerrillas.

articles.title: British Delegate Visits Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
articles.content:
British Delegate Visits Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Shawn Pikford, delegate of the British organization for the study of the Juche idea, visited the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front on July 6.
					 Jo Il Min, chief of the mission, said that the south Korean people more ardently revere General Secretary Kim Jong Il as the days go by and the activities of supporting, studying and disseminating the great Juche idea, the Songun idea are brisk. 
					
					 He informed the guest in detail of the struggle of the south Korean people to frustrate the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK and achieve national reunification, social democracy and rights to existence.
					
					 Shawn Pikford expressed thanks to the mission for extending positive support to the activities of the organization in the past. 
					
					 He evinced the resolution to intensify the activities for voicing solidarity with the vanguard fighters of the front and the south Korean people in their actions for independence, democracy and reunification in the future, too.
					
					 At the end of the conversation the delegate watched videos titled "Paean of the sun in Imo (1942)" and "Let's bring down fascist dictatorship" dealing with boundless reverence of the south Korean people for Kim Jong Il and their struggle for independence against the U.S. and for democracy against fascism.

articles.title: Japan's Moves to Escalate Confrontation with DPRK Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's Moves to Escalate Confrontation with DPRK Slammed
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The new "guidelines for defense plan" to be worked out by Japan late in 2009 is a very dangerous military document which should not be overlooked in terms of its contents, character and design, observes Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a signed commentary. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 In the new "guidelines" the Japanese reactionaries underscored the "need" to facilitate the establishment of the missile defense system under the absurd pretext of "threats" from the DPRK and China. This reveals Japan's intention to accelerate its conversion into a military power and bolster up its capability for preemptive strike. 
					
					 The call made by them for "coping with the "threat" from the DPRK in the said guidelines betrays their inveterate wild ambition to invade Korea and discloses their criminal scenario to realize it in the 21st century come what may.
					
					 The Japanese militarist forces seek to start their operation for conquering Asia by staging a comeback to Korea just as they did in the past.
					
					 This is clearly evidenced by their design to allow the exercise of "the right to collective self-defense" in the above-said guidelines. 
					
					 To this end Japan seeks to round off the framework of a "bill on special inspection of cargo" of the DPRK-flagged ships and formally adopt it as a "law" at a Diet session in the near future. This cannot be interpreted otherwise than a very grave development. This, at the same time, amounts to a politically motivated provocation to the DPRK perpetrated on the strength of law and the height of the hostile policy toward it.
					
					 The whirlwind of confrontation with the DPRK kicked up by the Japanese reactionaries is intended to push the DPPK-Japan hostile relations to an extreme phase and render the situation on the Korean Peninsula tensest in a bid to secure a pretext for staging a comeback to Korea.
					
					 The DPRK never tolerates any infringement upon its sovereignty and interests.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to immediately halt its reckless ruckus, deeply aware that the anti-DPRK confrontational racket is as foolish an act as inviting self-destruction, urges the commentary.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Brutal Suppression of Pro-Reunification Patriotic Forces Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Brutal Suppression of Pro-Reunification Patriotic Forces Flayed
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group recently announced a plan for one hundred day investigation into cases of violation of the "National Security Law (NSL)" and has buckled down to implementing it. 
					 This is nothing but an open declaration of a war against all the progressive forces in south Korea including forces desirous of achieving reunification through alliance with the north and a vicious anti-reunification fascist offensive aimed at totally eliminating them.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 In the first six months of the year alone the fascist authorities harshly cracked down upon the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration, the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and other organizations under it, branding them as the "enemy benefiting organizations."
					
					 The Lee regime's suppression aimed at stamping out the pro-reunification patriotic forces, in fact, reminds one of a "war" as it is large-scale and merciless. 
					
					 Lurking behind this repressive racket are the extreme uneasiness of the group of traitors about their ruling crisis and a wicked intention to turn the whole of south Korea into a tundra of the reunification movement and anti-"government" struggle by eliminating all pro-reunification patriotic forces that stand in the way of implementing the policy of confrontation with the DPRK under the pretext of "security." 
					
					 The group of traitors has become bete noire and a target to be toppled for its anachronistic confrontation with fellow countrymen and misrule. It is, therefore, seeking a way out of the crisis in perpetrating wholesale crackdown upon the pro-reunification patriotic forces.
					
					 The above-mentioned suppression of the pro-reunification patriotic forces amounts to a wanton negation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and an intolerable challenge to the whole nation desirous of the independent reunification under the banner of "By our nation itself."
					
					 The nation will never pardon the group of traitors getting evermore frantic in the suppression of pro-reunification forces swimming against the trend of the times.

articles.title: Meeting for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Italy
articles.content:
Meeting for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Italy
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A solidarity meeting took place in Italy on June 20 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle. 
					 The secretary of a district committee of the Communist Reconstruction Party of Italy in Rome in his speech accused the U.S. imperialists of instigating the UNSC to adopt an unreasonable "presidential statement" and "resolution on the sanctions" against the DPRK recently over the DPRK's just satellite launch and nuclear test and desperately kicking up a racket of pressurizing the DPRK. 
					
					 Socialist Korea's satellite launch was an exercise of a legitimate right of a sovereign state for the development of its science and technology and its access to nuclear weapons was an exercise of a sovereign right to cope with the U.S. nuclear threat and war moves, the secretary said, and went on:
					
					 We bitterly denounce the U.S. moves to ignite another war, oblivious of the lesson it drew from the shameful defeat it suffered in the war of aggression launched against the DPRK in the 1950s and urge it to stop them at once, extending full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and accomplish the cause of the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.  
					
					 The chairman of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy noted that all the achievements made by the Korean people give the progressive people of the world aspiring after independence, peace and socialism great confidence and courage. 
					
					 We extend the highest glory to Kim Jong Il always leading the Korean people to victory with his Songun politics and assure them that we will positively carry on the struggle in support of their just struggle, he stressed.

articles.title: Seminar Awakening Zeal for National Liberation
articles.content:
Seminar Awakening Zeal for National Liberation
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- It was in December Juche 23 (1934) when Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine, partook in a short course held in Nengzhiying, Sandaowan.
					At a seminar on socialism held one day, speakers told about only the experience of the then USSR in the socialist construction.
					
					Kim Jong Suk was lost in thinking, listening to them carefully. At last she rose to her feet and said that they had waged the revolutionary struggle overcoming ordeals to drive the Japanese imperialists out of their country and, at the same time, to build the socialist system free from exploitation and oppression by landlords and capitalists in the liberated country. She added that they should vigorously push forward the revolution for bringing earlier the day.
					
					Hearing her speech, the participants visualized the dream-like reality of the liberated country.
					
					They hardened their minds to defeat the Japanese imperialists and liberate the country at all costs under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung.

					 Zhang's son Zhang Jinquan on a visit to the DPRK laid the floral basket before the statue and paid tribute to him Tuesday.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung estuvo siempre a bordo del "Tren con destino al pueblo"
articles.content:
Familia de Zhang Weihua envia cesto de flores ante estatua de Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 7 de julio (ATCC) -- En ocasion del XV aniversario del fallecimiento del Presidente
					 Kim Il Sung, la familia de Zhang Weihua, martir revolucionario antijapones de China, hizo llegar un cesto de flores ante su estatua de bronce en la colina Mansu.
					 Zhang Jinquan, hijo del martir, de visita en Corea, rindio homenaje al Presidente tras depositarlo el dia 7 ante la estatua de bronce de este.

articles.title: Hazanas de Kim Jong Il realizadas en la causa de eternidad del lider
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung estuvo siempre a bordo del "Tren con destino al pueblo"
Pyongyang, 7 de julio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 15o aniversario del fallecimiento del Presidente    Kim Il Sung, se proyectan en estos dias en la television y los cines de Corea los documentales alusivos a su historia de actividades revolucionarias.
					 Las peliculas demuestran emotivamente la grandiosa vida de el quien convirtio la patria en el pais aduenado por el pueblo emprendiendo siempre el camino de la direccion sobre el terreno.
					
					 Dar el amor al pueblo significaba para el la revolucion y la politica, el placer y la alegria de la vida.
					
					 El Presidente, quien tomaba el ideario Iminwichon (considerar al pueblo como el cielo) como maxima de su vida, concibio en su viaje para compenetrarse con las masas populares -descrita metaforicamente aqui como "Tren con destino al pueblo"- las lineas, politicas, estrategias y tacticas para ellas, incluyendo la linea principal de la construccion de la economia socialista en el periodo posbelico, la orientacion de cooperativizacion agricola y la "Tesis sobre el problema rural socialista en nuestro pais", etc.
					
					 El estaba habituado a alimentarse de lo que comian los habitantes comunes y acudia hasta a las zonas montanosas mas apartadas de la zona septentrional del pais empujando a menudo su carro estancado en el bache fangoso.
					
					 En el recorrido por las parcelas de las granjas, senalaba hasta al anochecer el rumbo y remedios para alcanzar el buen rendimiento.
					
					 Cuando viajaba un dia en el tren, tomo como almuerzo una espiga de maiz cocido y se dirigio directo a una galeria de fondo para estimular a los mineros.
					
					 Desde octubre del 34 (1945) de la Era Juche hasta el periodo final de su vida, el estuvo mas de 8 mil 650 dias en su direccion sobre el terreno por la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo recorriendo un trayecto de mas de 578 mil km.
					
					 Brillan de siglo en siglo las inmortales hazanas del Presidente quien preparo el sistema socialista al estilo coreano centrado en las masas populares pasando toda su vida a bordo del "Tren con destino al pueblo".
					
					 El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea ven la imagen afectuosa y la sonrisa benevola del Presidente en la figura del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien visita sin treguas hoy las unidades del Ejercito Popular de Corea, las fabricas y las granjas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena nueva "guia de defensa" de Japon
articles.content:
Hazanas de Kim Jong Il realizadas en la causa de eternidad del lider
Pyongyang, 7 de julio (ATCC) -- Ahora cuando se aproxima el 15o aniversario del fallecimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung arden aun mas fervientemente la aspiracion y el deseo del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea dispuestos a enaltecer eternamente al Presidente, defender resueltamente su idea revolucionaria e inmortales hazanas revolucionarias y hacer brillarlas para siempre.
					 En la figura de Corea que tiene en gran estima invariablemente a su lider, el mundo ve los nobles rasgos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, personificacion suprema de la obligacion moral revolucionaria.
					
					Gracias al Dirigente quien considera desde el principio la fidelidad a su Lider como obligacion moral suprema de los revolucionarios, en Corea se realizo con brillantez la causa por la eternidad del lider.
					
					 Fue aprobada la Constitucion Kim Il Sung de enaltecer a este como eterno Presidente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y fueron establecidos la Era del Juche y el Dia del Sol, gracias a lo cual el pueblo coreano y los demas revolucionarios del mundo pudieron conservar mas ferreamente la conviccion de que el Presidente esta eternamente como el Sol del Juche.
					
					 El Palacio Memorial Kumsusan se convirtio en el lugar supremo del Juche donde se conserva eternamente el cuerpo del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					 En todos los lugares del pais se grabo magnificamente en lo arquitectonico y plastico la consigna de la confianza presentada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il "El gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung vive siempre en nosotros".
					
					 En el frente del Palacio Memorial Kumsusan y en las ciudades, aldeas, fabricas y empresas se colocaron cortesmente las imagenes del Presidente con una sonrisa tan radiante como el Sol.
					
					 Ademas, se arreglaron mejor los lugares de batalla revolucionaria y de interes historico-revolucionario y se construyeron por doquier las lapidas indicadoras de la visita de orientacion  y el monumento en memoria de la visita de orientacion para transmitir largamente las hazanas del Presidente.
					
					 Para enriquecer la idea revolucionaria del Presidente y mantener con firmeza la pureza de esta, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il presento la consigna revolucionaria "!Armemonos mas firmemente con la ideologia revolucionaria del gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung!" y publico numerosas obras, entre otras,  "El Partido del Trabajo de Corea es el partido del gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung", "Enaltezcamos eternamente al gran Lider y llevemos a feliz termino la causa del lider" y "La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea es el Estado socialista del Juche con invencible poderio".
					
					 Gracias a la direccion del Dirigente sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun (priorizacion militar) se defiende firmemente el socialismo al estilo coreano en que esta impregnada toda la vida del gran Lider; el partido, el Estado y el ejercito de Corea se han fortalecido al pie de la letra como el partido, el Estado y el ejercito del Presidente.
